articles.title: Buy the dip, sell the rip? BTC price levels to watch as Bitcoin taps $42K - Cointelegraph
articles.description: Bitcoin bulls see a welcome bounce to counter the BTC price dip as traders line up key price levels to watch.
articles.content:
Bitcoin (BTC) faces an uphill struggle to reignite its uptrend after its biggest one-day losses of 2023.
The largest cryptocurrency continues to claw back lost ground after falling to lows of $40,20… [+5439 chars]

articles.title: Memory-safe languages so hot right now, agrees Lazarus Group as it slings DLang malware - The Register

articles.content:
Research into Lazarus Group's attacks using Log4Shell has revealed novel malware strains written in an atypical programming language.
